projects: [{"title":"Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive Kolkata 2014","start_date":"Oct 2014","description":"Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive, one of the massive flagship events undertaken by the Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur is a one of its kind initiative held in 23 cities across the nation in order to stimulate the spirit of entrepreneurship and encourage students to embrace the idea of starting their own venture. Consisting of a series of guest lectures by eminent entrepreneurs,and workshops, EAD has been successful in kindling the vigour of creating oneâ€™s enterprise among the youth of the nation, ever since its inception in 2009."},{},{"title":"Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2014","start_date":"Jan 2014","description":"I worked in the Startup Team and organised the Startup Camp, where startups provided college students a unique opportunity to work with them as a full time employee or as an intern. In addition, the participating startups got a chance to pitch their ideas to prominent VC's of the country, thus giving an impetus to their venture. I was also a part of the Publicity team and was responsible for publicity of the event in Eastern part of the country along with Mumbai.The guest speakers at GES 2014 included names like Rajat Sharma (Chairman. India TV), Avinash Vashistha (CMD, Accenture India), Varun Agarwal (Co-founder, Alma Mater), MN Srinivasu (Co-founder, BillDesk), Ira Trivedi (Novelist), and many more."},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{},{"title":"National Service Scheme Camp 2013","start_date":"Nov 2013","description":"The National Service Scheme Camp 2013 consisted of 15 Units, each unit having different tasks to be caries for a time span of one week, in an effort to help the people of village Ayma, Kharagpur. I worked in Unit-07. We worked on construction of broken roads for proper infrastructure of the village. We also took various surveys regarding the current facilities available in the village and try to solve as many possible."},{"title":"Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2015","start_date":"Oct 2014","end_date":"Jan 2015","description":"I worked in Startup Team and organised Startup Camp 2015, which is a platform for all the startups to recruit students from IIT Kharagpur as well as among the participants as an intern or full time job. I also organised Global Entrepreneurship Conference, where we discussed the difference in entrepreneurial culture in India and other foreign countries. Mr. Vivek Wadhwa and Mr. Armin M. Kittle were the two speakers of this conference."},{},{},{},{},{},{},{}]
